div.p: This code system http://aehrc.github.io/genclipr-fhir-ig/CodeSystem/FindingType defines the following codes:

tr.td: An observation done by the patient, for example a symptom.
Observations derived from raw laboratory observations. For example, a positive laboratory test for the presence of nitrite in urine can be represented as an observation of Nitrituria.
Observations derived from imaging studies. For example, a brain MRI that shows signs of a stroke can be represented as an observation of a stroke-like picture.

description.value: Extends the Observation Category codes to include additional categories.

definition.value: An observation done by the patient, for example a symptom.
Observations derived from raw laboratory observations. For example, a positive laboratory test for the presence of nitrite in urine can be represented as an observation of Nitrituria.
Observations derived from imaging studies. For example, a brain MRI that shows signs of a stroke can be represented as an observation of a stroke-like picture.
